nodes.Name: Jordan Harris
nodes.Quote: Attending Northeastern University was one of the best decisions I could have made.

nodes.Name: Michelle Newman
nodes.Involvement_Link_Theme: Student Support; Faculty; Campus Life; Campus Life
nodes.Quote: During law school, I excelled academically, worked closely with several professors (Northeastern has the best ones), won best brief in the Boston regional competition of the ABA Appellate Advocacy Moot Court, and managed to publish an article in the Law Journal while mentoring 1Ls and keeping up with volunteer around Boston in my spare time.

nodes.Name: Kaila Corrington
nodes.Quote: I am incredibly grateful for all of the opportunities that Northeastern has provided as I prepare to graduate and enter the next phase of my life.
nodes.College: College of Computer and Information Science

nodes.Name: Philip Sheedy
nodes.Quote: I am so appreciative of the support that the Boston-Bouv Faculty Scholarship has provided me.

nodes.Name: Daniella Gaccione
nodes.Quote: I am so grateful to have had the opportunity to participate in Northeasterns experiential learning program.

nodes.Name: Alexander Piers
nodes.Quote: I cannot imagine my time at Northeastern without the global experience of Engineers Without Borders.

nodes.Name: Brandon Barrett

nodes.Quote: I hope you understand how much your support means to me and how much it has helped me establish an incredibly bright future.

nodes.Name: Daniel Moran

nodes.Name: Caton Downey
nodes.Quote: I will never forget your familys generosity and the influence it has had on my Northeastern experience.

nodes.Name: Nohemi Moctezuma

nodes.College: College of Social Sciences and Humanities

nodes.Name: Manny Cruz
nodes.Quote: It is because of the mentors, role models, friends, peers, donors such as you, organizations like Iota Phi Theta Fraternity Inc., and the community that I have surrounded myself with that I have been able to excel.
nodes.College: College of Social Sciences and Humanities

nodes.Name: Maria Soto
nodes.Quote: It is really heart-warming to see that others appreciate the significance and value of integrating Service-Learning into academic courses.
nodes.College: College of Arts, Media and Design

nodes.Name: Neel Desai
nodes.Involvement_Link_Theme: Entrepreneurship; Campus Life; Entrepreneurship; Campus Life; Faculty
nodes.Quote: Like many incoming ambitious students, I came here thinking about what I wanted to be. Very quickly, that transitioned into thinking more about the work that I wanted to do. I am confident in knowing that my experiences at Northeastern have set me on trajectory to be a business leader, particularly in the realm of technology, innovation, and social entrepreneurship.
nodes.College: College of Social Sciences and Humanities

nodes.Name: Francesca Napolitano
nodes.Quote: My sense of responsibility and service to others is the basis upon which I have pursued my pharmacy education. Thank you for your support of my goals and your devotion to assisting rising healthcare professionals.

nodes.Quote: Without this scholarship, I would not be able to fund my co-op opportunity at the Suicide and Mental Health Research group at the University of Otago, New Zealand.   I would like to sincerely thank you for your generous support of Northeastern students like me.

nodes.Name: Sarah Chou
nodes.Quote: Without your generosity, I would not have been able to attend the largest conference for women in computing. Being surrounded by successful, bright, and COOL women the entire week who were all either pursuing, or in a career path that I am interested in, was an experience I'll never forget.
nodes.College: College of Computer and Information Science

nodes.Name: Donnell Gresham
nodes.Quote: Without your kind hearts, I would not be able to play basketball while receiving a great education that will last a lifetime.

nodes.Name: Johanna Martinez
nodes.Receive_From: Northeastern University School of Law Seattle Area Fund
nodes.Quote: Without your support, I would not have been able to pursue my co-op at the Washington State Office of the Attorney General. Thank you for your generosity.
receiveFrom: Northeastern University School of Law Seattle Area Fund

nodes.Name: Adar Thau
nodes.Receive_From: Irving & Charlotte Backman Envi Coop In Memory Joan Backman
nodes.Quote: Words cannot express grateful I am for your generation, which enabled me to accept a co-op at the Sustainable Fisheries Group, which is dedicated to developing innovative solutions to promote the sustainability of marine conservation and coastal communities.
receiveFrom: Irving & Charlotte Backman Envi Coop In Memory Joan Backman

nodes.Name: Diego Rivera
nodes.Quote: Words cannot express how thankful I am for this scholarship.

nodes.Name: Dickson He
nodes.Quote: You and your family should know that your philanthropy and generosity has continued to help many students and made a positive impact in their lives and education.

nodes.Name: Alexander Plum
nodes.Quote: You are helping me achieve my goals and further my education in a field that I love. I thank you for your generosity.

nodes.Name: Chantel Riendeau
nodes.Involvement_Link_Theme: Student Support; Campus Life; Campus Life
nodes.Quote: You have changed my life forever. Sometimes the words thank you just arent enough  this is one of those times.

nodes.Name: Fatima Rios
nodes.Quote: You haveinspired me to make a difference in the world by helping others the way you have helped me. I will forever be grateful for this opportunity.

nodes.Name: Kyle Wolkwitz
nodes.Quote: Your assistance to me over the last few years has been truly life-changing and has positioned me to charge into my post-Northeastern career full of pride and ambition.

nodes.Name: Taylor Wilde
nodes.Receive_From: The Fung Scholarships; Manganaro Presidential Scholarship Fund
nodes.Quote: Your award made it possible for me to feel free of financial stress and happy with my co-op at cole Normale Suprieure, giving me the opportunity to make the most of my time in France.

nodes.Name: Diana Liu
nodes.Receive_From: Dunton Family New World Scholar Fund; Samuel Altschuler Scholarship
nodes.Quote: Your continuing support helps prepare students like me to become professionals and future leaders.
receiveFrom: Dunton Family New World Scholar Fund

nodes.Name: Catherine McLean
nodes.Quote: Your contributions helped shape Northeastern College of Computer and Information Science into the incredible institution it is today, and have personally changed my life.
nodes.College: College of Computer and Information Science

nodes.Name: Caitlin Gillies
nodes.Quote: Your donation has enabled me to sustain a job in public service and remain committed to working in the publics interest.

nodes.Name: Isaiah Thompson
nodes.Quote: Your donation has helped me focused on my academics and community service commitments.  I really appreciate it!

nodes.Name: Rachel Stoddard
nodes.Quote: Your family, and all of the families who support financial aid for students, have literally changed my life.  I am so very grateful for your generosity.

nodes.Name: Alexander Jackson
nodes.Quote: Your financial generosity has allowed me to be one step closer to reaching my goals.

nodes.Name: Anna Holding
nodes.Receive_From: Daynard International Public Interest Law Co-op Fund

nodes.Quote: Your financial support has contributed to this reality and my dream.

nodes.Name: Kacy Cuenta
nodes.Receive_From: The Richard G. and Clare E. Lesser School of Law Scholarship
nodes.Quote: Your financial support is helping me to realize a dream that I have had since I was in fifth grade--to become the first person in my family to receive a law degree.
receiveFrom: The Richard G. and Clare E. Lesser School of Law Scholarship

nodes.Name: Alyssa Telander
nodes.Quote: Your financial support of students like me was critical to my decision to attend Northeastern, and your support will continue to allow me to pursue my passion and provide legal services to low-income immigrant families as I begin my career.

nodes.Receive_From: Givelber-Subrin Public Interest Law Co-op; Givelber-Subrin Public Interest Law Co-op Fund

nodes.Quote: Your financial support provided me with an opportunity that has shaped my future career goals and I am forever grateful.
receiveFrom: Givelber-Subrin Public Interest Law Co-op Fund

nodes.Name: Christian Jepsen
nodes.Quote: Your fund helped me finance my co-op in Washington D.C., and focus more clearly on my duties working in Senator Elizabeth Warrens office as an intern. It is precisely for opportunities like this that I came to Northeastern University.
nodes.College: College of Social Sciences and Humanities

nodes.Name: Gabrielle Chapman
nodes.Quote: Your generosity enabled me to work in the nations premiere art gallery and learn from some of the most experienced professionals in the museum world. I cannot express my gratitude enough.
nodes.College: College of Social Sciences and Humanities

nodes.Name: Jason Blanchette
nodes.Quote: Your generosity goes a long way for students like me, who are committed to serving the public interest.

nodes.Name: Raegan Bonesteel
nodes.Quote: Your generosity has been very inspirational.  Hopefully one day I will be able to give back to the Northeastern community and help a student finish their education like you have so graciously done for me.

nodes.Name: Jovaun Jackson

nodes.Name: Johnny Fayad
nodes.Quote: Your generosity has greatly assisted my ability to gain an education at one of the most prestigious universities in the world, and set me on a fast track for a successful future.

nodes.Name: Brandon Breiner
nodes.Receive_From: The Richard G. and Clare E. Lesser School of Law Scholarship
nodes.Quote: Your generosity helps me to realize that NUSL is an amazing community, and that I should always remember to give back in any way that I can and to help future students in any way possible.
receiveFrom: The Richard G. and Clare E. Lesser School of Law Scholarship

nodes.Name: Catherine Steckbeck
nodes.Quote: Your generosity is helping me to travel to Cape Town, South Africa, to work for six months at the Athlone School for the Blind. I dont think I can thank you enough for your role in achieving this dream of mine.

receiveFrom: Leonard C Perham Engineering Legacy Scholarship Fund

nodes.Name: Christian Cherau
nodes.Quote: Your gift reinforces my feeling that I am just as much of a valuable asset to Northeastern as Northeastern is an asset to me, and it makes the education that I am paying for and working towards an asset much more valuable than just the numbers behind it. All I can hope is that one day I am able to return your generosity to another young and hopeful Northeastern student.
